article_text: The state board that regulates plumbing and heating contractors cracks down on employers improperly treating workers as contractors rather than employees. Their bite, though, is soft. The action follows a series last year by The News & Observer, Charlotte Observer and several other McClatchy newspapers.

article_summary:
The action follows a series last year by The News & Observer, Charlotte Observer and several other McClatchy newspapers.
The state board that regulates plumbing and heating contractors cracks down on employers improperly treating workers as contractors rather than employees.
Their bite, though, is soft.
